sections.content:
import { Headline } from '@motif/headline';

<Headline>Default Headline is H1</Headline>,
<Headline level="s">Small headline is H4</Headline>,
<Headline level="m">Medium headline is H3</Headline>,
<Headline level="l">Large headline is H2</Headline>,
<Headline level="xl">Extra large headline is H1</Headline>,
